content.query:
SELECT 'ChannelType' as [TableName], count(*) as [RowCount]
 FROM [adworks].[dbo].[ChannelType]
UNION ALL
 SELECT 'Country' as [TableName], count(*) as [RowCount]
 FROM [adworks].[dbo].[Country]
UNION ALL
 SELECT 'CustomerData' as [TableName], count(*) as [RowCount]
 FROM [adworks].[dbo].[CustomerData]
UNION ALL
 SELECT 'Date' as [TableName], count(*) as [RowCount]
 FROM [adworks].[dbo].[Date]
UNION ALL
 SELECT 'ProductData' as [TableName], count(*) as [RowCount]
 FROM [adworks].[dbo].[ProductData]
UNION ALL
 SELECT 'Reseller' as [TableName], count(*) as [RowCount]
 FROM [adworks].[dbo].[Reseller]
UNION ALL
 SELECT 'Sales' as [TableName], count(*) as [RowCount]
 FROM [adworks].[dbo].[Sales]
 UNION ALL
 SELECT 'SalesOrder' as [TableName], count(*) as [RowCount]
 FROM [adworks].[dbo].[SalesOrder]
UNION ALL
 SELECT 'SalesTerritory' as [TableName], count(*) as [RowCount]
 FROM [adworks].[dbo].[SalesTerritory]
